About me
Hey! I'm Vlad!
My name is Vlad Kovalov, I am 19 years old, I am from the city of Kharkov. I developed my interest in web development by simply visiting various sites. As time went on, I realized that I would like to begin to understand how they work and are developed. I love to share my experience and always enjoy receiving it from others. By myself, I am a sociable, purposeful and responsible guy! With pleasure I would like to join the team development and start developing various projects!
Education
I am studying at KNUR on the 3nd course in the specialty "Software engineering". I also took courses on Udemy "Web-developer" and "Full course JavaScript + React" , studied at EPAM courses, thereby practicing.
Skills
What do I use in my work?
HTML5
It is he who creates the skeleton of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow you to create a more SEO-optimized product structure.
CCS3
This style language allows you to create absolutely any look for a website or application. Everything is limited only by imagination!
Bootstrap
Free set of tools for creating websites and web applications. Includes HTML and CSS design templates for web interface components.
SaSS
A CSS-based metalanguage designed to increase the level of abstraction of CSS code and simplify cascading style sheet files.
JS
This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, getting data from the server, and much more.
React
This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product just for your goals!
